trans-unit.source: Exposes a file within isolated storage.
trans-unit.target: 公開隔離儲存區中的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Use this class to read, write and create files in isolated storage.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個類別來讀取、 寫入和建立隔離儲存區中的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Since this class extends <xref:System.IO.FileStream>, you can use an instance of IsolatedStorageFileStream in most situations where a <xref:System.IO.FileStream> might otherwise be used, such as to construct a <xref:System.IO.StreamReader> or <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 由於此類別會擴充<xref:System.IO.FileStream>，您可以使用 IsolatedStorageFileStream 的執行個體，在大部分情況下其中<xref:System.IO.FileStream>可能用，例如建構<xref:System.IO.StreamReader>或<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>.</xref:System.IO.StreamWriter> </xref:System.IO.StreamReader> </xref:System.IO.FileStream> </xref:System.IO.FileStream>

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此類型會實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。</xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the “Using an Object that Implements IDisposable” section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節<xref:System.IDisposable>介面 > 主題。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Isolated storage is not available for [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/add/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 隔離儲存區不適用於[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/add/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the application data classes in the `Windows.Storage` namespaces included in the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/add/includes/wrt-md.md)] API to store local data and files.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，使用中的應用程式資料類別`Windows.Storage`中包含的命名空間[!INCLUDE[wrt](~/add/includes/wrt-md.md)]來儲存本機資料和檔案 API。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Application data](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) in the Windows Dev Center.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[應用程式資料](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175)Windows 開發人員中心。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an object giving access to the file designated by path in the specified mode.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體授予存取權所指定的檔案物件 path 指定 mode 。

trans-unit.source: The isolated store that is used is scoped by the current executing assembly's identity and that of the application domain in which it is running.
trans-unit.target: 使用隔離儲存區的範圍是由目前執行組件的識別，以及正在執行的應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: This store will remain open only for the lifetime of the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> object.
trans-unit.target: 此存放區會保持開啟狀態的存留期只針對<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>物件。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: To specify a different isolated storage scope, or to allow the store to remain open (so multiple <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> objects can be opened from it), use the form of the constructor that accepts an <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定不同的隔離儲存區的範圍，或允許保持開啟存放區 (因此多個<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>物件可以從它開啟)，使用建構函式可接受的形式<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile>物件。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile> </xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: The `mode` parameter indicates whether a new file should be created, an existing one used, and so on.
trans-unit.target: `mode`參數會指出是否應該建立新的檔案、 使用現有的等等。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable and can cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取相同的字元具有不同的文化特性設定時，這些字元可能會無法解譯，而且可能會導致擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The relative path of the file within isolated storage.
trans-unit.target: 隔離儲存區中的檔案相對路徑。

trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.IO.FileMode"></xref>值。

trans-unit.target: path 格式不正確。

trans-unit.target: 找不到任何檔案和 mode 設為

trans-unit.source: The `mode` parameter indicates whether a new file should be created or an existing one used.
trans-unit.target: `mode`參數會指出是否應該建立新的檔案或使用現有的。

trans-unit.source: The `access` parameter includes read-only, read/write, and write-only.
trans-unit.target: `access`參數包含唯讀的讀取/寫入，和唯寫。

trans-unit.source: Clears buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the file.
trans-unit.target: 清除這個資料流的緩衝區，並造成任何緩衝的資料全部寫入檔案。

trans-unit.source: Because a buffer can be used for either reading or writing, but not both simultaneously, Flush performs two functions.
trans-unit.target: 因為緩衝區可用來讀取或寫入，但不可兩者同時排清會執行兩個函式。

trans-unit.source: First, any data previously written to the buffer is copied to the file and the buffer is cleared.
trans-unit.target: 首先，任何之前寫入緩衝區的資料複製到檔案，並清除緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: Second, if <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.CanSeek%2A> is `true` and data was previously copied from the file to the buffer for reading, the current position within the file is decremented by the number of unread bytes in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 第二個，如果<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.CanSeek%2A>是`true`資料先前已從檔案複製到讀取的緩衝區，檔案中目前的位置也會減少在緩衝區中讀取的位元組數目。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.CanSeek%2A>

trans-unit.source: The buffer is then cleared.
trans-unit.target: 然後會清除緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.Flush%28System.Boolean%29> method overload when you want to ensure that all buffered data in intermediate file buffers is written to disk.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.Flush%28System.Boolean%29>方法多載，當您想要確保所有中繼檔案緩衝區中緩衝資料寫入至磁碟。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.Flush%28System.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: Clears buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the file, and also clears all intermediate file buffers.
trans-unit.target: 清除這個資料流的緩衝區，造成任何緩衝的資料全部寫入檔案，並也會清除所有中繼檔案緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload when you want to ensure that all buffered data in intermediate file buffers is written to disk.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個多載，當您想要確保所有中繼檔案緩衝區中緩衝資料寫入至磁碟。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to flush all intermediate file buffers; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要排清所有中繼檔案緩衝區;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value indicating whether the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object was opened asynchronously or synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值，指出是否<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>物件以非同步方式或同步開啟。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronous <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> objects cannot be created, unlike <xref:System.IO.FileStream>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>無法建立物件，不像<xref:System.IO.FileStream>.</xref:System.IO.FileStream></xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>非同步

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.BeginWrite%2A>, <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.BeginRead%2A>, <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.EndWrite%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.EndRead%2A> methods are supported on synchronous instances, with some performance penalties.
trans-unit.target: 不過， <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.BeginWrite%2A>， <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.BeginRead%2A>， <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.EndWrite%2A>，和<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.EndRead%2A>具有一些效能的負面影響的同步執行個體上支援的方法。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.EndRead%2A> </xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.EndWrite%2A> </xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.BeginRead%2A> </xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.BeginWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object supports asynchronous access; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>物件支援非同步存取，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 它不會受到隔離儲存區配額。

trans-unit.source: The length of the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 長度<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>以位元組為單位的物件。

trans-unit.source: Prevents other processes from reading from or writing to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 防止其他處理程序讀取或寫入資料流。

trans-unit.source: Locking a range of a file stream gives the threads of the locking process exclusive access to that range of the file stream.
trans-unit.target: 鎖定某個範圍的檔案資料流可讓執行緒的鎖定的處理程序的獨佔存取該範圍的檔案資料流。

trans-unit.source: The starting position of the range to lock.
trans-unit.target: 要鎖定之範圍的開始位置。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter must be equal to or greater than 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值必須等於或大於 0 （零）。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to lock.
trans-unit.target: 要鎖定的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: position or length is negative.
trans-unit.target: position或length是負數。

trans-unit.source: The file is closed.
trans-unit.target: 關閉檔案。

trans-unit.source: The process cannot access the file because another process has locked a portion of the file.
trans-unit.target: 處理程序無法存取檔案，因為另一個處理序鎖定檔案的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current position of the current <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前的目前位置<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property works when the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.CanSeek%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性的運作<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.CanSeek%2A>屬性是`true`。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream.CanSeek%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current position of this <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前的位置<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The position cannot be set to a negative number.
trans-unit.target: 位置不能設為負數。

trans-unit.source: Copies bytes from the current buffered <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object to an array.
trans-unit.target: 從目前緩衝會將位元組複製<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: The `buffer` parameter can be an instance of the <xref:System.Buffer> class, or an array of one of the following types: <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.SByte>, <xref:System.Char>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>, <xref:System.Single>, or <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: `buffer`參數可以是的執行個體<xref:System.Buffer>類別或其中一個下列類型的陣列︰ <xref:System.Byte>， <xref:System.SByte>， <xref:System.Char>， <xref:System.Int16>， <xref:System.Int32>， <xref:System.Int64>， <xref:System.UInt16>， <xref:System.UInt32>， <xref:System.UInt64>， <xref:System.Single>，或<xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Single> </xref:System.UInt64> </xref:System.UInt32> </xref:System.UInt16> </xref:System.Int64> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Int16> </xref:System.Char> </xref:System.SByte> </xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Buffer>

trans-unit.source: The `offset` parameter gives the offset of the byte in buffer at which to begin writing (index in the buffer), and the `count` parameter gives the maximum number of bytes that will be read from this stream.
trans-unit.target: `offset`參數緩衝區中要開始寫入 （索引緩衝區中） 中指定的位元組位移，`count`參數會提供將會從這個資料流讀取的位元組數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The returned value is the actual number of bytes read, or zero if the end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: 如果已到達資料流結尾，傳回的值會是個位元組，則為零的實際數目。

trans-unit.source: If the read operation is successful, the current position of the stream is advanced by the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: 如果在讀取的作業成功，讀取的位元組數目進階資料流的目前位置。

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs, the current position of the stream is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生例外狀況，目前資料流的位置不變。

trans-unit.source: The Read method treats the `buffer` parameter as a block of bytes, regardless of its actual type.
trans-unit.target: Read 方法會將`buffer`做為區塊的位元組，不論其實際型別參數。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, the `offset` and `count` parameters are always specified in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，`offset`和`count`參數一律會以位元組為單位指定。

trans-unit.source: For `buffer` parameters other than byte arrays, this means that an element index must be multiplied by the element size in bytes to form a correct value for `offset` or `count`.
trans-unit.target: 如`buffer`這以外的位元組陣列的參數，表示曲線索引必須乘以項目大小，以位元組為單位來形成的正確值`offset`或`count`。

trans-unit.source: The Read method will return zero only if the end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: Read 方法會傳回零，只有當資料流結尾為止。

trans-unit.source: In all other cases, Read always reads at least one byte from the stream before returning.
trans-unit.target: 在其他情況下，讀取一定會讀取至少一個位元組資料流中傳回之前。

trans-unit.source: If no data is available from the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> object upon a call to Read, the method will block until at least one byte of data can be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有資料可從<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>方法將會封鎖直到至少一個位元組的資料可能會傳回物件時呼叫 Read。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: The buffer to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The offset in the buffer at which to begin writing.
trans-unit.target: 中要開始寫入緩衝區的位移。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的位元組數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The total number of bytes read into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 總位元組數讀入 buffer 。

trans-unit.source: This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero if the end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是小於如果許多位元組目前沒有提供，或如果資料流結尾為止，要求的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: Reads a single byte from the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object in isolated storage.
trans-unit.target: 讀取單一位元組從<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>隔離儲存區中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The 8-bit unsigned integer value read from the isolated storage file.
trans-unit.target: 從隔離儲存區檔案讀取的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle"></xref> object that represents the operating system file handle for the file that the current <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object encapsulates.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle"></xref>物件，代表檔案之作業系統檔案控制代碼的目前<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>物件封裝。

trans-unit.source: The SafeFileHandle property is not supported and always generates an <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException> exception.
trans-unit.target: SafeFileHandle 屬性不支援，且一律會產生<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException>例外狀況。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageException>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle"></xref> object that represents the operating system file handle for the file that the current <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object encapsulates.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle"> </xref>物件，代表檔案之作業系統檔案控制代碼的目前<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>物件封裝。

trans-unit.source: The SafeFileHandle property always generates this exception.
trans-unit.target: SafeFileHandle 屬性一律會產生這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current position of this <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 設定目前的位置<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>物件為指定的值。

trans-unit.source: Some <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> objects support positioning beyond the length of the stream, others will throw an exception in this case.
trans-unit.target: 某些<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>物件支援的位置超出資料流的長度，其他人將會在此情況下擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: The new position of the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 新位置<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.IO.SeekOrigin> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref:System.IO.SeekOrigin>值。</xref:System.IO.SeekOrigin>

trans-unit.source: The new position in the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 中的新位置<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The origin must be one of the values.
trans-unit.target: origin 必須是其中一個值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the length of this object to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個長度到指定的物件 value 。

trans-unit.source: If the specified `value` is less than the current length of the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> object, the stream is truncated.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定`value`小於目前的長度<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>物件、 資料流遭截斷。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: If the specified `value` is larger than the current length of the stream, the stream is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定`value`大於目前長度的資料流，擴充的資料流。

trans-unit.source: If the stream is expanded, the contents of the stream between the old and the new length are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果展開資料流時，舊之間的新長度的資料流的內容會是未定義。

trans-unit.source: In order to use this method, an <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> object must support both writing and seeking.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用這個方法，<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>物件必須支援寫入和搜尋。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: The new length of the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 新長度<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: value is a negative number.
trans-unit.target: value為負數。

trans-unit.source: Allows other processes to access all or part of a file that was previously locked.
trans-unit.target: 允許其他處理程序存取全部或部分先前鎖定的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The starting position of the range to unlock.
trans-unit.target: 若要解除鎖定範圍的開始位置。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter must be equal to or greater than 0 (zero).
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值必須等於或大於 0 （零）。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to unlock.
trans-unit.target: 若要解除鎖定的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: position or length is negative.
trans-unit.target: position或length是負數。

trans-unit.source: Writes a block of bytes to the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object using data read from a byte array.
trans-unit.target: 將位元組區塊寫入<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>物件使用讀取自位元組陣列的資料。

trans-unit.source: The `offset` parameter gives the offset of the byte in the `buffer` at which to begin reading, and the `count` parameter gives the number of bytes that will be written to this <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> object.
trans-unit.target: `offset`參數會提供中的位元組位移`buffer`開始閱讀，而`count`參數會提供這將寫入的位元組數目<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>物件。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: If the write operation is successful, the current position of the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> object is advanced by the number of bytes written.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業成功時，目前位置<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>物件前移寫入的位元組數目。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs, the current position of the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream> object is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生例外狀況，目前的位置<xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>物件並未變更。</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream>

trans-unit.source: The buffer to write.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset in buffer from which to begin.
trans-unit.target: 從其開始的緩衝區位元組位移。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to write.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的位元組數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The write attempt exceeds the quota for the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 寫入嘗試超過配額<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Writes a single byte to the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 將單一位元組寫入<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The byte value to write to the isolated storage file.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入隔離儲存區檔案的位元組值。

trans-unit.source: The write attempt exceeds the quota for the <xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 寫入嘗試超過配額<xref href="System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFileStream"></xref>物件。
